original_title: Police open fire at a motorcycle in Rambukkana
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Police opened fire at a motorcycle at the Hiriwadunna checkpoint in Rambukkana for failing to comply with orders to stop.
Broadcasting Regulatory Act still in draft stage, and will not be used to suppress the media – Bandula
No election in 2023, and election will be held when economy is stable – Bandula
